thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend with my daughters
thread.title_full: Weekend with my daughters - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andy H
title: Weekend with my daughters
text:
Very nice hotel staff very friendly and helpful
Check in wasn't until 15.00 which was a surprise although we could check our bags into a store room until that time so we could go and explore the area
Room is clean and tidy with the best shower in the world OMG I want to take it home with me
Breakfast is a buffet style with a good selection of food
The bed is very comfortable with good sound proofing in the room
Good value will definitely stay again
